v0.6, Jun 23, 2014 -- Initial release.
v0.7, Jul 06, 2014 -- Added support for image upload.
v0.8, Jul 14, 2014 -- Fixed style conflicts with Django admin.
v0.9, Sep 02, 2014 -- Added plugin, theme support.
v1.2.1, Sep 13, 2014 -- Upgraded Froala to 1.2.1, Django 1.7 and Python 3 fixes
v1.2.3.1, Nov 12, 2014 -- Added csrf protection for image uploads
v1.2.4.1, Jan 11, 2015 -- Fixed possible path traversal attack
v1.2.4.2, Jan 14, 2015 -- Used default_storage for saving images
v1.2.4.2, Jan 17, 2015 -- Minor performance fix
